Summary Heading: The rooms are very nicely laid out for an extended stay.
Summary: The room includes a nice kitchenette with full size fridge and freezer. Utensils if you like to cook. Dishwasher included. Nice layout of the room. Very comfortable bed. Everything was very clean. The staff is welcoming. And the complimentary breakfast had a lot of food options. I would definitely return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Randy, thank you choosing to stay with us. We appreciate that you took time to share your experience and feedback.  We are truly happy that everything well.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great find. Superb choice.  Wonderful staff.
Summary: When on long vacation I had 9 days of work to do, so we needed to find a suite w two separate rooms‚Äîone room for Zoom meetings all day, another room for my wife to have privacy or watch TV.  This brand new place was perfect. Staff all seemed very happy to work here. Nice room(s) w kitchen.  Could‚Äôve had more cook wear and Tupperware but we had cooktop and microwave and toaster and full-size fridge and freezer. Excellent bar and food‚Äîthis chef will be in bigger place soon.  Two free drinks per person per night.  Many breakfast choices.  Excellent COVID rules. Convenient on and off I-5 but quiet (we were on other side of hallway from freeway). Unique co-branding:  Hampton and Homewood with separate check in desks in lobby and separate wings on our floor but common elevators
Room tip: On the Homewood wing, if it matters to you, ask for room nearer the elevator because the hallway...
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review.  You touch on everything and I appreciate your kind words.  I am happy to know that our team did a great job in ensuring your wonderful experience.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Truly one of the best experiences and the entire staff including Lisa front desk manager was outstanding!!   Excellent hotel with excellent location and extremely clean & comfortable . Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by the friendly reception staff and Lisa made our visit more interesting with her advices & tips. Would definetely recommend this hotel to everybody! It's a true sample of excellent hospitality.
Manager Response: Truly amazing review and it's comforting to know that our team excel in the area of customer service which means a great deal.  Thank you for recognizing Lisa, I'm happy to hear that she was involve in making your trip more interesting. Thank you and please do come back to visit us.

Summary Heading: Great food, kind and professional staff, and clean establishment
Summary: The breakfast is amazing and ALL staff is so kind and professional. Parking is easy and safe. Very comfortable, decorative, and chic environment. Many areas to hang out and talk while drinking coffee/tea.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review and feedback. We are happy you had an amazing stay and our team was able to go above and beyond.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Booked a double Queen room for my family vacation and it was great. Will definitely come back again. Breakfast selection is a bit limited but decent. Hotel staff is polite and made us felt welcomed. Wished there was free parking though!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 stay rating and feedback.  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us for your family vacation.  Thank you!

Summary: We stayed at Homewood Suites for two weeks during house renovations. Serice was impeccable, breakfast was tasty, housekeeping was attentive and the room was clean and fresh. Everyone was friendly and we were always greeted with a smile. A special shout out  to Nadia, our housekeeper who worked so hard and to Ashley and Edna in the breakfast room who kept the buffet well stocked and whole place immaculate.
Manager Response: Thank you for such and amazing survey and feedback.  I appreciate that you took time to recognize the team and that they went above and beyond in making your stay an A+ experience.  We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: The breakfast food is consistently excellent at the Hampton in Irvine.   Today was chessy scrambled eggs, Bacon, and country potatoes.  Always a very clean dining area.  Well Done to Ashley, Edna, Gisel, and chef Michael!
Manager Response: Fantastic review and feedback.  Our team appreciates you and we are all extremely happy that your stay was outstanding. Wishing you a wonderful holiday season and a happy new year.

Summary: The staff made our trip an amazing experience. The manager Evan was very nice and accommodating. The hotel was super clean and new. Would recommend this hotel to family and friends. We will be back! Thank you Homewood Suites!
Manager Response: It was my utmost pleasure!.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I'm so happy that our team was able to make your trip an amazing one. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.

Summary Heading: The best hotel experience of my life!
Summary: The Hilton Homewood Suites was a total lifesaver as we moved out to remediate mold. I had the opportunity to reset myself and get a jumpstart on my health. The spacious studio had every amenity. I was able to rest and get a much needed stay-cation. Nigel and his staff are the kindest, most accommodating and generous. I highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Redhotmama17, I am so happy that you found us to be the BEST hotel that created the best experience for you.  Thank you for recognizing Nigel and the entire team.  We all do our best to make sure you have the #1, top of the line experience, going above and beyond to do so. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Thankful for this awesome Thanksgiving Dinner
Summary: We are 3,000 miles from home and got to enjoy a delicious, traditional Thanksgiving Dinner. First class all the way. Turkey, mashed potatoes, stuffing, gravy, cranberry sauce for 50 people. Everything was fantastic!
Manager Response: We were all delighted and happy to be able to serve you all. It was our pleasure and I'm glad that you enjoyed our special treat.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Have to say - I was VERY pleasantly surprised by this place.  I had some Hilton points and with the tanking Australian dollar, had to be a bit more frugal on my trip to the US. Normally I stay at the Marriott Irvine spectrum or the waterfront beach resort, but decided to give this place a go since it was very reasonably priced. I really didn‚Äôt know what to expect going into it, as have heard these places can be hit or miss.  The front desk were super friendly and immediately found me a room early (I checked in at 11am). I requested a room facing away from the freeway and it was honoured. The room is super nice, looks very modern and has a cute little kitchen. I am an absolute crazy person when it comes to noise and my room is quiet as can be.  I was so impressed with the place
Manager Response: Nicky, thank you for such an amazing review and detail feedback.  We appreciate it and I'm happy that our team went above and beyond to make your stay pleasantly exceptional. I'm so glad that you chose to stay with us over Marriott and we exceeded your expectations. Again, thank you and we hope the next time you are in the area, we will be your first choice.

Summary: I love this hotel!   I frequent the hotel on business quite a bit. They remember the room I want and it's always available when I get there. Tawny,  the bar tender always remembers your name and your favorite  cocktail üç∏. Nigel in management gives the best recommendations on nearby restaurants. They really make you feellikethisis your home away from home.
Manager Response: Derrick, it's been a pleasure to have you and your team stay with us.  I am extremely happy the team from our bartender - Tawny to our management team - Nigel goes above their normal duty to make sure that your expectations are exceeded. We look forward to seeing you every stay. Thank you for always choosing us and recognizing the team.

Summary Heading: Takuya at HomeWood Suites is awesome!
Summary: Takuya at the front desk was very professional, helpful, and courteous. We were impressed by his conscientious work ethic and professionalism tending to us while handling a busy front desk all by himself. The place is a great 5 stars establishment.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recognizing Takuya, it's a well deserve recognition and I appreciate that you took the time to review us. Yor feedback means so much to all of us and we hope to see you  again soon. Thank you for such and amazing review.

Summary: We stayed in a studio king suite for five nights while on vacation. Check-in was a very pleasant experience and when we inquired about premium wi-fi, Julian said he would comp it for us which was a nice surprise. This is a newer hotel in a great location that is central to many sightseeing locations. They have covered and uncovered parking options for $12/night, which is very reasonable compared to places in Anaheim. It's also close to tons of restaurants and stores so it's super convenient! Three of our favorite restaurants were: Biagio's Italian, M Cafe and Grill (Persian), and Avila's El Ranchito (Mexican). The 99 Cents Only store was a great place for groceries, too.   For two travelers, the studio suite is a fantastic value because you still get the full kitchen amenities
Manager Response: Wow, what a detail review and feedback. Thank you for all the positive comments and the minor critiques which will allow us to fix, we appreciate it so much.  Thank you for staying with us, and we hope to see you again on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Stylish, Clean and Helpful Welcoming Staff
Summary: This Hilton Homewood Gardens was Clean, friendly employees, good well stocked breakfast, has a welcoming lobby, looks newly remodeled, good style, convenient location, and  helpful staff.  I would definitely stay there again.  For a few days after I stayed down the road at the Hampton Mission Viego and I wish I would have stayed the extra days at Homewood Gardens.  In comparison, the Hampton MV was run down, had ants in the room, and the faucet leaked terribly in the bathtub (looked like a waterfall)
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review.  I'm so sorry for you unfortunate experience at the Hampton Mission Viejo, however, I am extremely happy that your experience at our property allowed you to right a positive review and gave you a much different perspective of Hilton. We are all happy that you chose us and that we were able to meet and exceed your experience.  We look forward to your next stay. I do apologize for the late response.  Thank you!

Summary: Very nice, clean, new, upgraded, fresh hotel with new modern structures and decor. The front desk staff and room service was very sweet, nice & helpful. I simply loved this hotel. Great location. We drove to San clemente outlet and got the trolley to move around to the pier and dana point . Awesome stay. Would üíØ recommend to anyone looking for a super clean,  fresh looking, fresh smelling hotel! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è The citrus water in the lobby was very refreshing in this summer heat but was unfortunately only available on the first day of our stay & I wish the parking was free.  Would definitely book this hotel again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback; we appreciate all of your kind words. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we all look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine Spectrum Lake Forest for a weekend evening since we attended an event in Laguna Beach. The hotel was modern, nicely decorated, and very clean. Staff and housekeeping were friendly and professional. The highway is next to the hotel, but we did not hear any noise -- soundproofed. Parking was $12 per night and a tag was provided to keep in the car. The breakfast room was large with many tables and the continental breakfast included eggs, potatoes, bread, breakfast meat, cereal, danish, yogurt, fruit, and more. The gym seemed nice and we noticed that guests were using the pool. Irvine Spectrum Center is an upscale outdoor mall that  is a short drive from the hotel and there are many restaurants, stores, and amusement rides - we had a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share such a wonderful experience.  Your 5-star rating is above none!  Our team were all thrill to been able to serve you; it was our utmost pleasure.  We hope to see you again, the next time you are in the area.

Summary: This hotel is very clean, and has a variety of amenities. The breakfast was what you'd expect from a Homewood, but the staff was quite friendly. Takuya, was particularly friendly and attentive while at the front desk, and during the Wednesday receptions. Tawny, the bartender, is also very friendly and attentive.
Manager Response: We all strive to provide a very clean hotel with exceptional helpful team members.  Thank you for recognizing Takuya and Tawny.  I am so happy that you chose to stay with us and we were able to create that 5-star experience.  Thank you!!

Summary: I was so happy with everything about this hotel.  Great location (BTW, we could not hear any road noise at all). We had a king suite with a pull out sofa bed. Plenty of room for my son and I to have our own space, even with the sofa bed out. Big kitchen and bathroom areas too.   The free breakfast was really good and fresh with lots of choices.   All the staff members we dealt with were really helpful and genuinely happy to help us.  Everything was exceptionally clean.  I loved that through my Hilton Honors app I was able to check in and select my room.   I will seek out Homewood Suites to stay wherever I go!
Manager Response: Fantastic review and feedback!! I appreciate that you chose to stay with us and we were able to be part of your experience. Thank you so much for sharing and we do look forward to your future visits with us.

Summary: Great place to stay... location, amenities and QUIET!  Very clean and well maintained facilities. One of the best we have stayed at abd we will be back. Highly recommended for families or business trips as well.
Manager Response: Awesome, looks like you had a fantastic weekend. Thanks for sharing your amazing experience.  We will be hear awaiting your next vist.

Summary: My stay was comfortable, welcoming and very enjoyable. Julian at the front desk was especially helpful providing me with everything I needed during my stay. 10/10 would recommend!! Fantastic rooms, fantastic service and overall spectacular hotel!
Manager Response: Great review and thank you for the 5 star rating!  Our team appreciates you and we all look forward to your next stay.

Summary: My rooms AC wasn‚Äôt functioning correctly so I called the front desk for immediate assistance. Within 3 minutes the front desk man quickly fixed the AC and success! Cold air was blowing and I can fully enjoy my stay. I would like to thank Julian for taking care of the issue and a quick shout out to Loyd for lending a hand as well. Way to go guys!
Manager Response: Manny, I happy that our team was able to fix your AC issues immediately.  Thank you for recognizing Julian and Lloyd, they both appreciate you.  Again, thanks for the feedback and the 5 star rating.

Summary: Have NO worries booking this hotel.  It is CLEAN and new.  The location is safe and convenient.  The breakfast is far better than most hotel freebies.  The pool and hot tub and are inviting and well maintained.  The rooms are attractive and beds comfortable.  Wish there was a door to block the light from the sink area in the bathroom, but we made do.  Can‚Äôt say enough about the staff; from the front desk to the breakfast crew, they are friendly and truly can‚Äôt wait to help.  This our second stay here and we wouldn‚Äôt look anywhere else when visiting the area.
Manager Response: Thank you, you touch on every point and the feedback is just amazing.  I'm glad we all made your stay and experience a 5 star.

Summary: Great stay. Room was clean and well stocked. Guest services were very friendly. Was able to check in early. Did not get disturbed throughout stay. Staff was very professional. Did not have any issues during stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to rate us and share your amazing experience.  Glad to know that you were not disturbed during your stay. Thank you so much for the feedback, much appreciated.

Summary: In town for meetings and am a longtime Hilton Honors Diamond member‚Ä¶ I only bring this up to make a point, been to a TON of Hilton properties all over this great country! Tawny is AMAZING, best ever! She‚Äôs friendly, knowledgeable, and remembers everyone‚Äôs name, seriously?!?! I will definitely be back to the Hampton and not the Garden Inn next door from here on out!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I happy that Tawny was part of your decision for you to choose us. She does provide amazing service.  Thank you.

Summary: Tawny was on point with customer service and a classy gal while behind the bar. She offered a great selection of beer and spirits. Great social conversation and made sure to stay engaged with guests. Thank you
Manager Response: Tawny is a wonderful bartender and she appreciates your kind words and feedback. AS noted, she does provide great customer service and we are all happy to know you were here to experience such great service.  Thank you and we hope to see you again.

Summary: This is a very nice property overall.  I enjoyed the pool, spa, gym, and had two breakfasts.   In particular I would like to commend and compliment front desk associate ‚ÄúYasm√≠n.‚Äù  I had contacted her in the evening  to resolve a noise issue and she was the most pleasant, understanding and helpful associate ever!  She was a problem solver and exhibited exceptional customer service.  So even if there were any other minor issues, my interaction with her made them all go away.  Thank you Yasm√≠n - a true asset to this Homewood Suites by Hilton!
Manager Response: I am so happy that Yasmin was able to assist with the noise issue and thank you for recognizing her. I also appreciate your review and feedback.  Hope to see you again the next time you in the area.

Summary Heading: My Go To in Irvine Area.
Summary: Love this hotel. Clean and in a great location. This is Definitely my go to hotel in the Irvine area. Easy access to the 405 north or south, easy access to great restaurants and Irvine spectrum. The staff is always friendly and efficient and very professional.
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing us. We appreciate your kind words and our team is always ready to serve you, it's been our sincere pleasure. We all look forward to your next visit. Thanks for the feedback.

Summary: several collogues and I visited this Hilton location during a two week assignment. The staff always greeted us with a smile. Special thanks to Nigel for going above and beyond for making our stay memorable. Special thanks to Tawny and Mike for providing exceptional customer service on a daily basis. The staff knew all of our names by the first night, which may seem insignificant, but that personal service makes all the difference in my opinion.
Manager Response: It was pleasure to serve you and your collogues and we are extremely that happy that our team went above and beyond to meet your expectations.  Thank you for sharing your experience and recognizing our team.  We appreciate you and your collogues and look forward to your next visit whenever you are in the area.  Thank you.

Summary: The staff remembers every guest by name.  The friendliest staff and accomodating as l have ever dealt with.  My boss, who is a Marriot guy said he would never get this type of service where he was staying.
Manager Response: Derrick, Happy belated birthday from ALL of us. Wish were here to celebrate it with you but I do know that Nigel made sure you had an enjoyable and unforgettable one.  You and your team are always welcome at our hotel, we love having you here as we know this is your home away from home. Thank you so much for your kindness!

Summary Heading: My go to place to stay
Summary: This is a top rated place to stay. A must stay. The Homewood Suites are the best. The entire staff is friendly, kind , courteous especially Nigel  Lewis ( Assistant General Manager). I will always stay here whenever I am in town.
Manager Response: Richard, you are an amazing guest and we are all happy that you chose our hotel over and over again. It was and is always our sincere pleasure to welcome you and make sure that you always feel right at home.  Ore entire team appreciates you so much.

Summary: For the past few months I‚Äôve been staying here for work and it has been by far the best stay I‚Äôve ever had. The staff is friendly and works hard to make you‚Äôre stay as comfortable as possible. 10/10 would stay again.
Manager Response: Antonio, great review and we are here to serve you and to always make sure your stay is comfortable. We hope to have you continuing staying with us and if there's anything we can do to make your stay even more comfortable, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for the feedback.

Summary Heading: Best hotel l have been to since 20 years as a Hilton Member
Summary: OUTSTANDING STAFF!!  Marlo, the Director, Nigel Lewis, the Assistant General Manager, Evan Smith, the General Manager, Tawny, and Claire as your bartenders.  I have spent more than 30 days at this hotel and they make me feel like family every day!  The location is perfect with plenty of restaurants around.  If you need a good suggestion of a place to eat, please go to Nigel, he hasn't let me down yet.  From the Mediterranean to a simple burger place.  Claire and Tawny always have a smile on their faces and know how to make a great old fashion.  Evan is always there to assist with anything.  My place to stay when visiting the Lake Forest area.
Manager Response: Hello Derrick, it's always our pleasure to host you and your group here at the Homewood.  We have been delighted to serve you all and it makes us happy knowing that we have been able to be a part of your experience. It's great to know that you have become part of our family and we always look forward to see you. Thank you for the recognition as well as for recognizing the team.  Do know that we are here to continue making your stay and future stay splendid.

Summary Heading: I will never stay anywhere else when I come to the area!!!
Summary: The rooms are great but what really makes me return is the outstanding service I receive every time I visit. The staff is so friendly and helpful. Through the multiple stays I have felt that I was a part of their Homewood family. The service here is 5 stars with out the 5 star price. Evan, Nigel, Tawny, Clair and the rest of the Homewood staff Thank you for your outstanding service I hope to see you again on my next visit.
Manager Response: Mr. Garvin, it's always a pleasure to serve you and your team.  I speak for the whole team knowing that we enjoy your stay with us and always look forward to your visits. Your loyalty to our hotel is highly appreciated and do want you to know that we appreciates you. You have become part of our family here at the Homewood. Thank you for choosing us over and over again.

Summary: I loved the layout of the room at this hotel. Similar to a studio at a resort. Very clean. Very welcoming staff. Bed was very comfortable. This was a week long business trip and my first stay here. But I would highly recommend it, and will stay here again.
Manager Response: Randy, I'm thrilled that you loved the layout of our rooms. I do admit myself that the bed are comfortable, so comfortable that I had to purchase a couple of them for myself.  Thanks for the recommendations and we look forward to your next visit, hopefully the next time time will be a leisure stay.

Summary: Tawny, Clair, and Nigel made me feel at home and I had a wonderful experience at this hotel.  There is no Hilton hotel  I‚Äôd rather stay at in the area.  The accommodations were excellent and the staff is friendly and ready to serve.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience and we are happy that the Homewood Suites Irvine Spectrum is your home away from home. I'm delighted that you have recognized the team as I know it is always their pleasure to serve you and make sure that stay is always comfortable as they create that 5 star experience.

Summary Heading: Great Service.. Definitely a 5 Star Stay!
Summary: Came in for a weekend away and was extremely surprised with how friendly and welcoming the front desk staff was. Rooms were clean and food was great. I will definitely be going back for my next weekend away trip!
Manager Response: Olivia, thank you. I'm happy our team were able to provide you a 5 star experience. That's the very least we strive for. We appreciate you and your time for rating us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Had a wonderful experience as I had stayed an extended period of time, especially the staff at the bar was very attentive along with the housekeeping, jasmine and Julian at the front desk were very professional and went above and beyond to make my stay amazing
Manager Response: Emmanuel, thanks for the 5 star review. Truly a great review know that you had an amazing stay and recognizing the team that was part of that experience.

Summary: Always a great place to stay! Phenomenal staff, friendly and professional. The hotel is clean, quiet and rooms are fairly priced. It is centrally located. I would recommend this place anytime for a short or long stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review. I am truly happy that you've enjoyed your stays with us, extremely appreciative that you recognize our team.  Thanks for recommending us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I came in and didn‚Äôt know what to do and I felt very awkward for the most part but a worker named Nigel L stood out the most and helped me and made me feel comfortable in my visit. I‚Äôm thankful to him.
Manager Response: Isaiah, your feedback back is awesome and appreciated. Thank you for staying with us and recognizing Nigel and the team and it's our pleasure to provide great costumer service.

Summary Heading: Eat at the bar The Nigel special
Summary: Come one come all and stay here very nice place to stay i‚Äôve stayed here before and it was very nice rooms are clean everything if you have any questions just let the front desk know that I hope you are as best as they can they have a poor they have a Jacuzzi
Manager Response: Nestor, I wanted to say thanks for your recent stay here at our hotel! Thank you for your feedback and the recommendation, our team appreciates you entirely.

Summary: Great staff and spacious rooms. Social hour is a key event for homewood ask for Erick.  The GM Nigel makes you feel like your at home. Very clean and front desk is always on top of their game. Location is great with food on every corner.
Manager Response: Romans, excellent review. Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and recognizing Erick and Nigel.

Summary: I have not 1 complaint about this hotel. Best thing about the stay are the employees. Specially Nigel the GM. Made our stay feel home away from home. At the bar Tawny is a blast. Eric from sales is a heck of a guy to chat with during social hours on Wednesdays. I recommend this place 10/10.
Manager Response: Jesse, thank you for recognizing Tawny and Nigel. I'm sure they appreciates you and enjoys the time you spend at the bar.  Thank you so much.

Summary: There was a lot of little details that were done by the staff to make the hotel shine.  The staff was very friendly, professional, and helpful.  We love Homewood Suites hotels; this one really stood out!
Manager Response: Thank you for the Amazing feedback and recognizing our team.  I am glad that he was able to provide you amazing service as well a clean hotel allowing us to shine in your eyes.  This is what we are all about and so very proud of our team.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: There was so much hair in the bathroom that wasn‚Äôt mine when I first went in the room. It was absolutely disgusting. I had to re-clean the room myself. Other than that the room was nice. Nice getaway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback of your recent stay with us. I was very sorry to hear that you were unhappy with the cleanliness of your suite. It is our goal to exceed the expectations of our guests. I am working with our housekeeping staff to prevent this from happening in the future. I hope that if your travels bring you back to the area that you will consider staying with us again.

Summary Heading: Not good for large groups/sports teams.
Summary: This hotel does not have a place for large groups to gather if you have children and they are not accommodating at all. They expect kids to be locked down in their rooms remaining quiet the entire time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience.

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed in numerous 4* hotels over the past 6 months on business trips to the US. This hotel is one of the best and was hands down better than the higher rated hotels I‚Äôve stayed at. It‚Äôs new modern clean with excellent amenities. The fully functional kitchen was the reason I selected this hotel and I wasn‚Äôt disappointed. The king bed was super comfy and the large  double shower is preferable to the in bath showers at other hotels. I also used the washing machine and computer/printer  facilities available at the hotel. I highly recommended this hotel for the savvy traveller.
Manager Response: NIcola J, thanks for sharing your recent experience. It was our pleasure to have been of service and I am thrilled that your experience was that of a 4 star hotel. I am also glad that your expectations were exceeded as our team are always working hard to those expectations of our guests. I wish you a Happy Holiday season, a wonderful 2022 and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great property and staff! We stayed for 1 night after a long day at Disneyland. Only 20 min from the park and perfect location for us as we were on the way to San Diego the next morning. Travelled with my best girl friend and we were more than comfortable in the King Studio. Breakfast was fresh and hot! You could tell the team was hustling to keep it that way. Wish we could have stayed longer to enjoy the rest of the amenities, but we will definitely be back after receiving excellent service from Evan, Nigel, and Yasmin!
Manager Response: Dayne94rose, it was our sincere please to serve you and your guest during your stay.  Thank you so much for your feedback and review. Seems your stay was a great one even though it was short. Whenever you are in town, please do make us your home away from home and our team will be here to welcome you always.  Thank you.

Summary: Homewood Suites is my family‚Äôs go hotel. The staff is always friendly, attentive, and professional. The rooms need a room key inserted to have power‚Äîenergy saving building is a plus! Recommended 100% to anyone who can afford it
Manager Response: Danielkofmp, thank you for the feedback and your 100% recommendation to everyone. We appreciate it and it was our pleasure to serve you and your family.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Wow!!! Felt like a boutique hotel! Excellent!
Summary: This is the nicest Homewood Suites I‚Äôve ever stayed at!!!  It‚Äôs SO clean and updated!!  It felt like I was at a boutique hotel with all the wanted amenities of a larger hotel.  I don‚Äôt have enough great things to stay about the cleanliness, friendliness of staff, ease of access from freeway.  Excellent location. Will be back!
Manager Response: Hello 154tiffanyi, thank you for your recent review. It was our pleasure to host you and your group.  We are all thrilled that you enjoyed your stay.  Our entire team shares your excitement and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Hotel was great, clean and new. Although there was a shortage on fruit for breakfast my overall stay was excellent! I would stay in this Hilton again in the future! Rooms were spacious, very clean and beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you Brooke for your recent review, very much appreciated.

Summary: Was there for business but pleasantly surprised by the size of the room, comfy king bed and full kitchen. It was a studio and everything including the hall way was spotless. Liked the gym and parking was easier, great location I walked to starbucks and nekter juice each morning
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate the time you took to review us and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The staff made our stay enjoyable and free of stress. The room, lobby and community areas were well maintained and very clean. Hotel staff adhered to CDC recommends and guidances. As a HH customer I felt vaulted and welcomed from my arrival until departure.
Manager Response: joannarrington, thank you for sharing your recent experience.  I'm excited to know that your stay was stress free and that we were able to meet and exceed your expectations. Thank you for being a Hilton Honor member and of course, you are very valued.

Summary: Great experience,clean, peaceful, calm, inviting. Respectful staff and crew. Hardworking! Thank you all. Was here for 3 month due to working in medical field. Never had a problem. Attended to my every need. Very helpful.
Manager Response: I wanted to say thanks for your recent stay here at our hotel! I hope you felt at home. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We sincerely appreciate your feedback.  .  We can‚Äôt  wait to welcome you home again soon!

Summary: Good location, clean hotel, friendly staff. Finally hotel has hot buffet-breakfast.  Only one issue: twice in two weeks plus stay asked to clean a room. Every time I asked to a room takes three days and 3 attempts.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel.  We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry your room was not service as often as it should have.  We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary Heading: poor/rude front desk service, denial of due responsibility of errors leading to property theft
Summary: When we  checked in at the homewood suites during a family vacation, we spent a while clarifying from the front desk staff at that time about parking my bike. They ( two hotel front desk staff on duty at that time : ~ 6 PM 07/25/2021) kept looking for  some keys to bike racks but they couldn't find them and then they asked me to park at the bike stand near the entrance of their covered parking garage. My bike was later stolen from the bike stand ( cable locks were cut open by someone). I wasn't sure then as to what keys they were looking for, until I looked up myself inside the parking garage spaces, much after the incident  to find that the hotel actually  has multiple dedicated  enclosed/caged parking for bikes, with locks for the cage which they likely do/could offer to
Manager Response: We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. It is our goal at Homewood Suites to make you feel at home and provide excellent service. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: Area was nice, rooms were spacious and clean. housekeeping staff was amazing. Manager Julian was very friendly and helpful in terms of things to do during the day. Definitely will be coming back! Great customer service all around.
Manager Response: LizcS2611SC, thank you for the Amazing feedback and recognizing Julian.  I am glad that he was able to provide you amazing service as well as the housekeeping team.  This is what we are all about and so very proud of our team.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The hotel is new, well located and maintained. We had complimentary breakfast and for what we paid we were expecting a little more choices. The bed was not done every morning, probably due to safety and cleanliness Covid-19 protocol, but I didn‚Äôt find a note of that. Elevator was crowded, so I would have appreciated a more restricted rules on the use of it. Overall the hotel is good for a short stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel.  We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were not able to meet all your expectations. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: During my stay my pull out couch had no blankets or sheets I asked the front desk they said I can use towels for a sheet and only had one blanket for me the room was unprepared. breakfast was crazy It seemed they were not prepared for the amount of guest for breakfast there was a big lines waiting for anything to come out from the back. I was also told by the night clerk if I wanted to complain I could do it online they did nothing for me and I‚Äôm very disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel.  We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy and had such a bad experience to rate us so low. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We definitely drop the ball but we hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Stay, Excellent service, perfect location.
Summary: Stayed at this hotel recently and had the best experience ever. From the moment I check I'm the staff was extremely profesional. They were all very friendly and always had a smile on their face. You can tell they enjoyed their job and love being at work. Got the pleasure of meeting the GM-Evan Smith and the sales manager Marlo Klein. They both were very helpful and pleasure to talk to. You can tell that the Management team at this hotel cares crees about their guests and staff. They made feel welcome. This now my home away from home.
Manager Response: Dear FranciscasE6633WQ, your review means so much to us.  We appreciate your kind words and are thrilled that you had a great stay.  Sharing your recent experience really helps other travelers when deciding where to stay, as I know when I'm looking I'd tend to look at reviews which helps in me deciding which hotel I am go to go with.  So thank you so much and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: I stayed at the Homewood Suites in Early June as I was visiting for a wedding and  I must say that it was absolutely amazing. The rooms were nice and comfortable. The staff, especially Illiana and Jorge, were great. The buffet breakfast was really good as well. I would definitly visit again.
Manager Response: Dear Tylers745, what an amazing review.  I would feel exactly the same had I stayed at this hotel.  It seems everyone went above and beyond to make your stay a memorable one and I'm sure it added to the experience of the wedding.  Thanks for recognizing our team and acknowledging them, they certainly appreciate it.

Summary: My stay at Homewood Suites was awesome. My husband and I had a very relaxing time which is what we were looking for. From Check-in to check-out the entire stay was memorable as the staff were so friendly especially Jorge, Iliana, Michelle and Itza.  I would recommend this hotel to all my family and friend and I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Thompson, our team does a great job in trying to make every guest stay a memorable one and it looks like they accomplish that.  It's great that both you and your husband were able to have a relaxing time during your stay.  If you are ever back in the area,  we look forward to welcoming you.

Summary: Beautiful hotel, great location, quiet clean and peaceful.  Friendly staff who are very accommodating to your needs. Highly recommend and would definitely revisit. Thanks to the Lloyd, Leo, Eva and Hector just to name a few of the  staff for a pleasant and enjoyable stay
Manager Response: Angel1, we appreciate your recommendation to others and the time you took to recognize our staff. I am happy that you chose us over so many other hotels in the area. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Great property, friendly staff, good breakfast
Summary: Our Airbnb feel through last minute, so we needed to find a nice, clean, place to stay in close proximity to our son, that also offered a full kitchen and area for my husband to work. This hotel had it all!  The price was great as well.  The hotel is like NEW, exceptionally clean, spacious rooms, comfy beds and pillows, great gym, FREE tasty breakfast, FREE beer & wine at night, friendly & helpful  staff especially Iliana, Julian and Lloyd.  The only thing I would encourage them to add is a safe in every room.  Other then that, it's a GREAT place to stay, a home away from home !!!
Manager Response: Carolyn, I am happy to read that our property was able to accommodate you and met all of your expectations.  Not the best of feeling when you when you were expecting to stay at an Airbnb, only to find out that was not going to happen. Sharing your wonderful experience with us and the staff tells a lot and we appreciate that you took the time to let other travelers know. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and that we made you feel at home.  If ever you are back in the are, we will be here to welcome you back.

Summary: Newish Homewood Suites with kitchen amenities and great buffet breakfast. Very clean property. Price reasonable for Orange County. Conveniently located just off I-5. Several good restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review, it helps other travelers especially myself when I'm travelling in choosing the right hotel.  We very much appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and we are all happy that to had a great stay. Do come back and visit us again.

Summary Heading: Worst hotel I ever stayed at!!!!
Summary: I wrote a long letter to upper management regarding my nightmare at this hotel!!! Between the terrible customer service with nobody to help with luggage even though I had a health issue, my room temperature uncomfortable because air-conditioning did not work properly with dirty vents and a black filter, a unsanitary bathroom with hairs in the bathtub, the sink on the floor, and having to move rooms because of all of it at 4am to sharing the information with Evan Smith(GM) as requested by the manager, finally going to sleep in my new room and then asked to vacate the property because After reviewing my pictures of the dirty room via email, I was told ‚ÄúI am not a fit for the property ‚Äú instead of apologizing for the dirty and unsanitary room. I have never been treated like this
Manager Response: Dear livenlove22, thank you for sharing your experience, however I am heartbroken that you feel this way as we are in the hospitality business and it's never our intention to make our guest have a bad experience.  We do hope everything works out for you and if you are ever decide to give us another try in the future, things might be different.

Summary: Very clean and pleasant place to stay. I will be coming back. The drink tickets just add a touch of charm and bring me to the lounge for a beer and a burger. The staff is always very professional and accommodating.
Manager Response: What a wonderful thing to say and I'm sure our employees very much appreciate it.  Glad to know that the drinks tickets were useful and allowed you to enjoy our lounge.  Thank you for sharing your experience and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: New property, clean, quiet, working out a few issues due to Covid.
Summary: Nice property along I-5 in Lake Forest, yet quiet even though near freeway. Large property as Hampton Inn also attached. Breakfast room crowded due to both hotels utilizing currently, many times food was sparse, selections limited. Rooms are large and comfortable. Some amenities closed due to Covid restrictions. Once these restrictions lifted, hotel can operate more efficiently. Bed a little lumpy for 1 year old property. Overall, nice stay and we booked another week to see family later in the year.
Manager Response: Shuttrrbug, thank you for sharing your experience and we look forward to your next visit later in the year.  Thanks for sharing your comments concerning the breakfast room, something we can work on and appreciate the feedback. Thank you.

Summary: This is one of the new hotels in the area. The Staff were awesome, during my stay. The room was clean, it is in a very nice location, safe and quite. Free hot breakfast and Free parking garage! Thank you very much
Manager Response: Joseph, what a great review.  Recognizing   Llyod and Eva is awesome and I will share your comments with them.  I'm sure they were thrill to proving great service and making your experience with us a wonderful one.  Thank you.

Summary: Go team spectrum Lake Forest in Irvine. The front desk is beyond helpful each and every individual presented themselves as friendly helpful and went above and beyond our expectations. We had two rooms and both of them were perfect for our needs as a family or as a couple. The hotel was super clean!
Manager Response: mkbkauai, what an amazing review. I too would feel the same way about not staying anywhere else.  It's comforting knowing the team exceeded your expectations.  We do look forward  to your next visit whenever you are in the area.

Summary: Every employee from the front desk to the maids,gave excellent service,will return to this hotel every time,anytime I‚Äôm in the area.The hotel is very clean and the service is excellent.The swimming pool is will heated,and the Jacuzzi is very comfortable.
Manager Response: MystycSabra33, thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  It always great and exciting when you our guests have a fantastic experience. Your comments really means a lot and sharing this with the team encourages them to take it to another level. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I live the place very quiet clean and organized. I very strong recommended this place and I‚Äôm ve very please yo coma just again sooner. Thanks for being very kind respectful and joyful.  Great service ever.
Manager Response: Hello icarus19452021 , Thank you for staying at the Homewood Suites and are happy to hear you stay was great and enjoyable.

Summary: I had an excellent stay at this hotel.  I stayed at Homewood Suites for six weeks, and it was a very comfortable.  The rooms were immaculate and I appreciated that hotel staff only cleaned the rooms upon request.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. TitiG, we are happy to hear you stay at the Homewood suites was excellent and our staff made it comfortable. We hope to see you in the future.

Summary: Huge rooms with full kitchens!  Very nice rooms and beds.  Definitely a home away from home.  Large beautiful lobby with plenty of parking.  Breakfast is included.  Price is definitely worth it.  Close to Irvine Spectrum...
Manager Response: Hello Joerenteria, Thank you for your 5 star review! We truly appreciate it and happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again soon! Sincerely, Bianca Gilman Director of Sales

Summary: I booked this hotel last minute over the phone. Upon arrival, Iliana got me checked in right away & was very helpful. Now she provided some great service! Nice alcohol selection in the fridge area. Amazing service overall, clean/modern rooms, friendly staff. 10/10 in my book. I will be booking here again when in the area!! - Javier R.   gmail: ruizrecordsllc@gmail.com
Manager Response: Hello RuizRecords, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We certainly appreciate your feedback and we are happy to hear that you found the room to be clean.  I am extremely happy that you had an excellent stay and thank you for recognizing Iliana.

Summary: Great place to stay. Staff are very friendly very nice and very clean room. feels like at home. I highly recommend this place if you were traveling to Orange County visit this place. my family enjoyed this place. we will surely come back to this place. Thanks to the staff for assisting us . very good job. five star to this hotel!!!!
Manager Response: Dear paulcasti, thank you for staying with us. I happy to hear that the team was accommodating. WE hope to see you the next time you are in town.

Summary: I have been at this hotel for 2 weeks now and I have not regret one thing. Homewood suites hotel is more than just a hotel it is like a home. Not just the room felling like home but the staff that make you feel at home. I appreciate the manager Amber Postel she has helped me with any small problems with such an amazing attitude I really appreciate how she smiles and wants every guest to be happy and have a good experience at the Homewood suites. Amber makes everything much more clear and she treats all guests as if they were her family. She definitely deserves the position she has as a manager and with the positive charming attitude she has she definitely will be more than a manger with time. Amber thank you so much for making me and my husband feel at home and I appreciate you
Manager Response: Hello 732salmar, thank you for recognizing our team, Amber. I extremely happy that she contributed to a pleasant experience. We certainly appreciated that you chose to stay with us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU MEIA
Summary: My stay here was beyond amazing as always!!!! The hotel is very close to everything! 20 minutes away from Laguna Beach. Less than 10 minutes away from the outlet, less than 5 from the freeway, and 10 minutes away from John Wayne! This hotel is very convenient and the rates are beyond reasonable. Besides the hotels awesomeness, the staff here are great, friendly and makes you feel at home. One member of the team Meia has made my stay extra special again! When we first checked in we had issues with finding our reservation. I was orginally booked for hampton but booked incorrectly, Meia helped us make a new reservation but wanted me to try out homewood suites since the amenities were better. She made the process smooth, easy and got us in on a timely manner. The room was so
Manager Response: Hello Johnnyboyseattle1989,  Thank you for taking the time to write your feedback during your recent stay with us! I am delighted to know you enjoyed your stay with your family and that everything worked out well in the end! I am glad I was able to ensure your stay was satisfactory! I cannot wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: All dishes were in dishwasher running when we checked in. Tv remotes were in plastic bag coverings as well. During COVID, no housekeeping unless requested as well as no hot breakfasts. Only bagged breakfasts. Coffee was in lobby but no water. Big con is that although very new property, walls were super thin. We could make out what language the neighbor was speaking in next door. Unfortunately it seemed their living room was next to our bedroom + the two neighbors we had during the length of our stay were either early risers or on eastern time zones, I was woken up to them talking on the phone at 5-6 in the morning each day.  However, overall great experience and value for the money. Appreciated the cleanliness!
Manager Response: Good Evening Ohana_Kauai,  I am delighted to hear that your overall stay was amazing during this trial we are all facing. I do want to also acknowledge and apologize if you were not able to get a good nights rest during your stay. We want to ensure every guest is enjoying their stay along with feeling at home. Your comments and feedback will continually help us provide a better guest experience. Again we appreciate you and cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Brand new hotel with great service- Larissa and Iliana = ROCK!
Summary: With Covid going on a lot of hotels are taking shortcuts and blaming it on Covid- when it's just shortcuts. This hotel has great service. Iliana and Larissa at the front desk are going above the call for anything that needs fixing. The manager Nigel and I didn't get off to the best start but he fixed some issues at well.  The rooms are fantastic and new. The pool and daily coffee (24hrs) is a great touch. Parking is easy and free. Wifi is great. Super nice and I extended!
Manager Response: Hello Georges5704, Thank you for taking the time to write your feedback on your recent stay at our property. It is delightful to know your overall experience was exceptional and that our two lovely employees Larissa and Iliana went above and beyond to ensure you had a wonderful staycation. We are also delighted to know that you were able to enjoy the amazing amenities that we provide! We are happy to know that you love our property just as much as us! our positive feedback will be notified by management to celebrate our two employees. We appreciate you and we look forward to seeing you on your next future stay!

Summary Heading: Larissa and Iliana is the BEST!!!!!
Summary: I am a lazy person, so for me to have the energy to write this review is only because my expectations were exceeded. Just want to say I initially wanted to stay only one day but the excellent service I received from the staff made me stay 10 days, the whole of my visit to California.  Due to the pandemic, no room services unless requested. So for the first and second day, I would stroll down to the front desk and ask for tissue, kitchen towel and washing tablet. Quess what, by the 3 morning, the front desk staff already have it ready all in a bag for me. But what impressed me the most is the genuine sincerity they have shown toward me, I don‚Äôt know how they can smile and greet me time after time with such energy and genuineity! Well, they did it! Thank you !!!!!!    STAFF=
Manager Response: Hello AmazingExpectation, First and foremost, we want to thank you for taking the time to write your feedback on your recent stay at our property. It is delightful to know your overall experience was exceptional and that our two lovely employees Larissa and Iliana went above and beyond to ensure you had a wonderful staycation. Your positive feedback will be notified by management to celebrate our two employees. We appreciate you and we look forward to seeing you on your next future stay!

Summary: First, this is so easy to get to.  It can't be more than 50 yards off I5.  So from the time you get off the freeway to the lobby is like 2 minutes.  All the staff is great.  I am horrible with names, but they are all really friendly and helpful.  The hotel has a huge breakfast/happy hour area, although its closed rignt now to to Covid.  But it will be great when open!!  the rooms are set up nicely and comfortable.  Easy temp controls, lots of outlets, and the best part:  a ceiling fan over the bed.  Room was nice and quiet with good light-blocking drapes.  Its right across the stree from a nice strip mall with lots of good places to eat.  I love the Inka Grill (Peru).  but lots to choose from.  So its a great place to stay.  BTW, it has a kitchen, full 'frig and dishwasher, but
Manager Response: Dear Bill K, Thank you for your amazing 5 star review at our property. It is definitely a convenient area that we are in due to various of restaurants being near us along with the freeway as well! It is also pleasant to know that our staff was nothing but respectful and kind during your stay. It is very important for us to ensure our staff is helpful and friendly during everyone's stay so that we can receive positive reviews like yours! It is definitely a sad time we are living, and we do wish our restaurant was open for our guests to use but unfortunately due to the circumstances it is best for us to ensure we are practicing social distancing to prevent more cases from rising. We do hope in the near future when it does become open or even sooner that we see you again! Thank you again for your amazing feedback and we appreciate your ongoing business with Hilton.

Summary: My husband and I needed a getaway and decided to try out this brand new hotel as a staycation-So glad we did! The staff is extremely helpful and friendly. Hilton is doing a wonderful job with their stay clean procedures, when we arrived the dishwasher was sealed so we knew everything had been thoroughly washed.   The hotel is a quick drive to Irvine Spectrum so the location is perfect to enjoy a nice dinner date then head back to the hotel and relax in their hot tub.   Bonus: The rooms have a kitchenette so if you‚Äôre like me and always have leftovers you can bring them back and enjoy later by heating up in the room.   I don‚Äôt usually write reviews but I wanted to share this amazing find for those for you; like me looking for a clean, convenient and comfortable place to get away
Manager Response: Dear Rubydog7, So very kind of you to share your rave review of our new property! and the authentic hospitality that our hotel has be known for! It is delightful to know our staff were absolutely amazing during your time with us and we will be sure to recognize our staff during your staycation and celebrate as a result of you sharing your experience with us! We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary Heading: 1 night stay- wish it were more!
Summary: We had to stay somewhere due to our house being fumigated and so happy to find this gem!  This hotel has only been open a month and everything is top notch and modern!  Super clean hotel, they have protective glass at the check in stand and plenty of hand sanitizer in the lobby area. They had  seals on the doors and the dishwasher so you know that everything was thoroughly sanitized.  The room had a full kitchen with pretty much everything we needed.  We really felt at home at this hotel, actually  better because we don‚Äôt have a Jacuzzi! You do have to sign up to use at the Front Desk because of Covid distancing but it‚Äôs super easy & the staff is very helpful. We felt very safe from Covid, even safer than our house!  Thank you Homewood team for taking care us in our time of
Manager Response: Dear Lucafam, First and foremost, thank you for choosing Hilton as your number one property to stay in during your house renovations. We definitely appreciate your business and thank you for your positive feedback on our new property! It is delightful to know you and your family enjoyed our property just as much as us!

Summary: Great hotel open for only 4 weeks. Very nice staff. Every single employee made a point to greet us every time we passed them. Clean and very nice.  We made an reservation for the pool and it was great. Went in everyday. They had bagged breakfast for us. 24 hour coffee available. Michelle at the front desk was great helped us quite a bit. When we left another hotel that was horrible to come there.  We will stay again for sure.  We will be switching from Embassy Suites to Homewood Suites.
Manager Response: Dear Lisaktilton, Thank you for your amazing 5 star review! We definitely appreciate your positive feedback on our brand new hotel! We want to ensure our guests leave satisfied with our property and quality service. We thank you for giving our front desk agent Michelle a positive shout out! Thank you for being a valued guest with our Hilton properties, we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Comfortable quiet stay with husband and 3 month old baby
Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel on a Friday night. It was quiet and very comfortable. Conveniently located right off the freeway, very easy to find and lots of parking.   Beautiful floors as you walk in! Really cute furniture, nice atmosphere! We had a king room on the freeway side and to my surprise you couldn‚Äôt hear any freeway noise at all. Our 3 month old baby slept well, which is always a good thing! The beds were extremely comfortable, wish I could take the mattress home with me! The room had a kitchen area, we didn‚Äôt really use it, but it looked nice and clean.  Overall this was a great experience and we will be coming back.
Manager Response: First and foremost, we want to thank you for taking the time to write your feedback on your recent stay at our property. It is delightful to know your overall experience was exceptional. We appreciate you and we look forward to seeing you on your next future stay!

Summary: Very clean, the staff are very helpful and friendly, the furnishing and the rooms are very clean and new. There is a lot of parking. During the COVID pandemic, the pool is closed but the fitness room is open, and the breakfast was limited, but it was complementary, and to use the wifi you need to give your last name and room number which means it is pretty secure compared to other hotels. Michelle who helped check out was also very helpful and helped explain things that confused us.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed our property and the amazing authentic hospitality that it comes with! Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your five bubble experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated. We hope to see you soon in the near future!

Summary Heading: Brand New and EVERYTHING you need!
Summary: I had to come down to California at the last minute to visit family and this hotel was close and reasonably priced.  I didn't know it had just opened!  Everything was pristine, the lobby, rooms, lounge.  Things are different because of Covid, so I had to request things I needed from housekeeping (towels, extra soap, etc.).  But this is preferable for me since I don't really want/need extra people in my room (and all the staff I encountered were wearing masks, which was very comforting).  I had a "King Studio" room which has a full kitchen - very nice surprise and handy considering mostly everything in California is closed (sigh).  I went to the grocery store, stocked up, and made all of my meals there.  Much healthier :).  Kitchen had everything I needed - even tupperware for my
Manager Response: Good day Loveshockey27, our team  is delighted you had a five bubble visit and enjoyed our wonderful hotel as much as us!  Our mission is to be the friendliest and cleanest hotel in Orange County and elated you were able to experience the authentic hospitality we have become known for over the years.  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit.

Summary: Not a good experience at all. Front desk staff are rude and very unhelpful. Rooms are not cleaned well and unlike other Hilton properties this hotel does not disinfect well. Rooms are not sealed and guaranteed to be disinfected. Our microwave was filthy and the room needed be re-cleaned. During COVID and this area being in the rise for deaths and cases, this is unacceptable. There was also a problem with the outlets in that every time you plugged something into one, the room would go dark and the fuse would blow. During our entire week long stay there was no housekeeping. No extra towels or soaps. You need to call to the front desk to request everything. We piled our trash in the hallway and used towels as did everyone else. They were gone usually by the next day. The stairwells
Manager Response: Dear 639wendyk,  Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent visit with us and our most sincere apologies we did not exceed your expectations.  Your comments have been shared with our housekeeping team, our guest services team and can assure you the appropriate ongoing retraining is being conducted throughout the entire hotel to ensure a more favorable guest experience moving forward.   Again we appreciate your feedback and hope to see you in the near future.
